number of helpful: 4 of 12 people (33%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: March 28, 2014
												Keliatan dari namanya Yet Another Zombie Defense, game ini sama kayak game lainnya dengan genre yang sama, menghadirkan game top-view shooter dengan elemen Tower Defense, tapi kita defense sendiri diri kitanya, bukan tower atau base atau semacamnya. Yang gw bingung, judulnya cuma buat sindiran buat game dengan tema sama yang lagi mainstream atau apa? ---SPOILER--- Kita bisa milih 3 karakter disini, ada the GUY, the GIRLS, dan The SWAT. Zombie-nya? ada Mr dan Ms. Zombie. Cuma dua? iya cuma dua, sayang banget dan harusnya gamenya bisa lebih dipoles. Nampilin banyak macam jenis zombie.Stage leveling? Ada 3 elemen penting, setiap level akan naik kekuatan serangan, kecepatan dan kekuatan bertahan zombie akan naik seiring dengan naiknya tingkatan level. Grafisnya mulus, semulus paha gaben #eh. Tapi sangat disayangkan UI-nya gak menarik banget. Too plain, too simple. Meskipun cewek-cewek UI pasti lebih menarik #eh. Sound-nya kurang greget, musiknya bikin bosen karena cuma satu dan selalu berulang-ulang, karena suara lain yang bisa kita denger cuma suara tembakannya aja, suara zombie ketembak itu gak ada. Jadi buat apa judulnya Zombie, kalo suara zombienya gak ada? kayak nonton bokep Jepang suaranya di bikin mute. #ehGame ini bener-bener cocok dimainin sama temen sekitar 3-4 orang. Kalo udah main sama temen udah pasti bisa sampe level tinggi, karena tingkatan levelnya kalo buat main sendiri masih agak  tinggi antara satu level sama level lainnya, perlu banyak uang biar bisa bertahan dari gempuran level yang jauh semakin sulit. Namun ini hal yang menjadi menarik kalo main sendirian, harus bijak menggunakan uang buat apa. Buat fences kah? buat ammunitions kah? buat naik angkot kaah? #ehMeskipun gw ke data sama steamnya belom dalam jam mainnya (kebanyakan main offline). Gw udah bisa nyimpulin, patut dimainin? IYA kalo kalian punya temen atau waktu senggang. Patut dibeli? IYA karena harganya murah dan alasan lainnya cuma FOR THE LIBRARY!Developernya berjanji, kalo game ini populer, semua DLC bakal gratis. Ya semoga DLCnya bener-bener Worth to Play. Tapi bener ini game genre begini dengan jenis yang sama udah banyak diluar, bahkan bisa dibilang sebenernya game ini harusnya gratis, sayang banget mereka harus ngecharge $2, seenggaknya $1 mungkin?Gameplay: 4/10Storyline: -Graphics: 6/10Sound: 3/10Stage Leveling: 7/10Terima Kasih,Mahesa Nugraha#backtouniverse

number of helpful: 1 of 6 people (17%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: January 25, 2015
												I know the games will have future updates but I'd post my review for the game as it is now. Pros:[+] Who doesn't enjoy games when you're with your friends?[+] High replay value despite being so simple.[+] The controls. Nothing beats WASD + Mouse.[+] Challenging. I like the idea on looting the drops manually to get cash and ammos.[] The game could use better sound effects. You don't see a quiet shotgun now do you?[] More content, more! Characters, zombie types, modes, the game is too small.Cons:[-] Bugs... Sometimes, when you build a barricade the indicator disappears.[-] After playing a couple of hours, the game becomes repetitive and you're most likely only after the high score instead of the fun in it.[-] Zombies only have their offensive and defensive stats increase and increase in number when you go up a night.[-] It becomes " numbers > skills " when you go past wave 14. The map is crowded that if you don't build a fortress you're pretty much done and you'll need atleast 3 people too.[-] Shop navigation is a pain in the♥♥♥♥♥[-] Did I mention how bad the flame thrower is?This game has potential and it's not that bad as it is now despite having more cons than pros. So, I'm recommending it.

number of helpful: 74 of 160 people (46%) found this review helpful32 people found this review funny
content:
Posted: November 18, 2014
												Less complex but slightly more polished than your average Flash game, YAZD is an extremely mindless game where you shoot zombies, get cash, buy stuff, and repeat on an utterly plain map. You build walls and/or autoturrets, buy ammo, shoot zombies, get cash, buy stuff, repeat. Sometimes zombies drop cash, you pick it up, buy stuff, repeat. I guess if you were playing it co-op you might have more fun shooting zombies, picking up cash, buying stuff, placing walls, and repeating while your partner shoots zombies, picks up cash, buys stuff, places walls and repeats, but for me I didn't have much fun shooting zombies, getting cash, buying stuff, placing walls, and repeating.The good news is, during sales this game has an extremely low price, so there's a low barrier of entry to shoot zombies, get cash, buy stuff, place walls and repeat. If shooting zombies, getting cash, buying stuff, placing walls and repeating sounds fun to you, Yet Another Zombie Defense is definitely a standout in the shooting zombies, getting cash, buying stuff, placing walls and repeating genre, but I personally am not a fan of the genre of shooting zombies, getting cash, buying stuff, placing walls and repeating genre so I can't recommend it. Very repetitive.

content:
Posted: March 4, 2016
Perfect un-polished and crap looking zombie shooter, but the game is just perfect!This is new for me, a crap and graphically un-polished zombie top down shooter with an amazing gameplay and experience.The game is very simple and it's straight to the point, it actually has some early access feeling inside of it.Some more info about the gameplay; In YAZD ( Yet Another Zombie Defense ) it's up to you to survive the nights of horror and help your friends out in horrorfying situations.You have a big arsenal of weapons for all possible ranges and damages, you have turrets, barricades and other lethals to design your own base, every survived night you will be able to design your base and buy/sell items and upgrades.There is enough content to spend at least 2-3 hours alone and with friends you won't get bored before you hit 10 hours.This game is made to be played with friends and has all right to deserve a saturday night with friends online or locally.Let's rate this game fellow readers !Pros: Amazing easy to learn but hard to master gameplay Super fun with friends Fast paced gameplay Great features such as base designing Steam trading cards support Good and challenging bunch of achievements availableCons: Graphics are terrible Menu's look awful Some things look unfinishedSo in a nutshell this looks like a unfinished game and they should fix that and continue the development ( faster or continue with it ) but the game performs like a finished and amazing zombie shooter.I can only recommend this game to all of you as it has  a great price tag and it's a nice addition to your game collection.It's worth it!Thanks for reading !

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: November 16, 2015
												When I read all the great reviews on this game, I decided to purchase the 2pack for $2.99.  I hopped in the game and matched up with 2 random players online.  Game was a bit fun for a few rounds.  Then I started to wonder why the graphics would lag when about 25-40 zombies would be dead in the same round.  My pc build could handle crysis 2 on ultra settings and almost any other very high end graphics game on high.  Anyways, i continued to play, and building forts didn't matter anymore because they would go down within the first 15 seconds of a round.  Every round resulted in everyone dieing in the first 20-25 seconds MAX except for myself.. I found myself just running in a circle around the map with a chainsaw and slowly killing the rest of the zombies.  The only challenge was to get the money before it disappeared (for the other players to spend) while having no upgrades on pickup reach/range.  So, basically, 1st game i played of zombie defense and already i was invincible with probably the cheapest weapon buy in game, the chainsaw.  Everyone thought i was hacking but obviously they were just too.. dumb to actually listen to me when i say "just run around in a circle like i have been every round and you won't die."  So in conclusion, the idea sounded VERY fun, i've always wanted to play a defense map where you could upgrade either weapons or your character stats and build turrets.  The game however, lags when more than 30 zombies are dead on your screen, weapons are very similar in damage and effect so there's not a lot of interesting/entertaining strategies you could use.  Although there are a nice range of weapons you could buy (but like I said they are all similar so it's not a big difference of buying them).  So, good idea, bad development.Oh and I told my friend that I gifted the 2nd part of the pack to not even waste his time.  This game was not only a waste of even the small amount of $2.99, but a waste of an hour of the very limited game time that I have.

content:
Posted: April 22, 2014
												Seriously people, this game is exactly what it says it is.  It's defending yourself from zombies.  You have a light pole and have to basically purchase and setup defenses around said light pole to survive night after night of zombie waves that increase in difficulty.  You also have to purchase weaponry and ammo for yourself, although there aren't any upgrades for said weapons.  The game is extremely simplistic, so don't expect much.  Playing with your friends is highly recommended, as that's where the enjoyment comes in.With a cost of $1.99 I'd recommend this game, even if you only try it out for a little while.  That said, I wouldn't pay any higher than that.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 10, 2014
												Great little game! Works really well with Xbox 360 controller. Developer seems active on the forums, open to all sugestions! Really looking forward to some of the proposed features of the game!The game really requires some skill, I think the furthest I've got is night 12, passing a night feels really rewarding! After that it gets crazy but from what I've read the developer is working on that.Multiplayer feature is fun but games are hard to connect to and sometimes just lag out. I'm guessing this is being worked on too.No real settings options. Not a big deal for most PC gamers however if your running intel 3000 or less graphics you may get some serious graphical lag even in low resolutions, would like to see visual quality adjustments. Would like to see support for more resolutions, Has trouble over 1080.Gameplay is straight forward and fun! I could nit pick some small things like weapons, characters and other stuff but for the price and the fact it's easy to pick up and have fun, everything else is just icing on the cake!

content:
Posted: April 5, 2014
												This game is alot of fun, but it does get a little boring on your on. The multiplayer is pretty damn fun and can host up to 4 people in one game which is fine for me. A few cons about this game are the map layout and characters. You can't build your bases far out into the world, so they have to stay rather small, which really makes your chance of survival a little bit less because they WILL get in eventually. As for the characters, you have a very strict choice. "The girl, The guy, and the swat guy". Pretty weird, right? Unlockable characters would be nice. Overall, this game is a blast, but i hope to see more in the future. But hell, for 2 US dollars, it's pretty enjoyable! I would get it, especially when it goes on sale.

I could nit pick some small things like weapons, characters and other stuff but for the price and the fact it's easy to pick up and have fun, everything else is just icing on the cake!

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: July 8, 2014
												This game will not change your life, but it is fun and addicting The entire game centers around a single street lamp at the middle of a very small map. The further you venture from the lamp, the darker it gets. So you are ecnouraged to stay near the lamp but not restricted from straying. It's your standard horde mode in that waves of enemies are sent against you that increase in quantity and difficulty as the game progresses. Killing enemies can net health, money, or ammo drops that disappear over time so you must be somewhat quick in picking them up. In between the waves you have the opporuntity to purchase various weapons and defenses which can give you a great advantage in the next wave. A nice feature is that these items will ocassionally go on sale making them significantly cheaper than their original price and stretching your money further. This can help in giving you that little edge up you need earlier than you would otherwise be able to afford it. Which can seriously help late game.As stated before, this game will not change your life and it isn't without it's faults. Mainly, it's limited. I would really like to see it grow and have new weapons and defenses added, maybe slightly expand the map over time. As is, this game is worth every bit of the few dollars I paid for it and I hope to see more. I'd give it a 3/5

Posted: August 8, 2014
												I get the feeling I'm going to become addicted to this quite easily. Considering the price this is a great game. It's not exactly Dead Island but for a zombie killing game you can curently buy for 54p, it's brilliant. Each weapon has its own advantages and limitations but the pricing ranges seem to have been worked out very well to correspond with the progressive difficulty of each level and when you're likely to be able to buy them. Controls are simple but there is no need for anything more advanced in this kind of game.Overall good game especially if you've got a bit of time to kill but not enough time to get into a big game. And it could easily become more than just a a way to kill time. Thouroughly enjoyable.

												There are many things this game has going for it, but some it doesnt.Pros:*Fun to play with friends*The content that's their is good as is*Worth the money (Not expensive for the amount of enjoyment)Cons:*Hosts can troll and not buy others guns*Sometimes only host can buy weapons, and other times, everyone can buy their own weapons*Not much content (Game runs out of new experiences relatively quickly)*UI for beginning of rounds has two toughness multipliers (One is the damage of the zombies, and the other is health of the zombies, but which is which?)*Not enough people playing to get much variation in survival stylesAlthough I did have more cons than pros, the pros far outweigh the cons, which is why I find this game to be relatively enjoyable if you want a game that will last a couple hours and then the contents' subpar.

content:
Posted: July 29, 2015
												Bought the game when its on sale: $0.39 i think or a little higher. Its fun once you get used to the basics and the mechanics of the game. It could be played defensively or a Run and Gun type of style, but its targeted more to defence in its way of gameplay and since it has zombies drop power ups and extra cash its just pointless to play on defence. In the way of graphics, they arn't too impressive and the animations are just really basic and the textures are just bad, so are the player models and just make you want to barf. This also means you don't need a highly powered pc to play it and means more people that only have a laptop can play. Its also easy to start a private server and join other servers as well. This game is not fun if you're going to play by yourself, but since its so cheap, you can by another copy for a friend and thats all good. The final verdict is a 6/10. Its a cheap yet okay party type of game and with it being on sale all the time its a solid mini-game to play with friendsX/10 Verdicts___________Graphics: 4/10 Not very good/ You don't need a Gaming PC to play-----------------Gameplay: 6/10 Solid and okay with the keyboard-----------------Party Options: 7/10 Has what it needs.-----------------Guns: 6/10 Has basics and outragous guns such as a RL and a Freeze Gun?!-----------------*Sound: 3/10 Makes you just to turn off all the sound and add your own music.-----------------Final Verdict: 6/10 Above Average-----------------Check out my Youtube where I make videos and animations whenever I want to! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSHRe_IrFFJxQMcNybHLqFw

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 22, 2014
												Seriously people, this game is exactly what it says it is.  It's defending yourself from zombies.  You have a light pole and have to basically purchase and setup defenses around said light pole to survive night after night of zombie waves that increase in difficulty.  You also have to purchase weaponry and ammo for yourself, although there aren't any upgrades for said weapons.  The game is extremely simplistic, so don't expect much.  Playing with your friends is highly recommended, as that's where the enjoyment comes in.With a cost of $1.99 I'd recommend this game, even if you only try it out for a little while.  That said, I wouldn't pay any higher than that.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: July 3, 2015
												A deceent wasd game, I got this game for free and honestly would have been quite dissapointed paying anything more than $1.99. Single player is alright, however to get to level 30 is nothing less than a feat. The multiplayer is decent, even more so with friends.There are 2 kinds of turrets, the 1st turret is basically a non upgraded person who never misses; the second turret (mark ll) Is like having an ally with 2 upgrades maybe 3 in reload and never misses, the downside is of course that you run out of ammo quickly so make sure you but quite a bit. A very good strategy is buying a good gun that was on sale ASAP, because the zombies have a chance of dropping ammo of guns you have purchased (you do not have to equip said gun/s). There are 3 different kinds of palisades (walls); wood (useless), steel and electro: (not sure if steel is a higher durability then electro but electro does do damage.Pros-High replayability (wanting to get a higher score every time you play, changing what types of guns to purchase and when to buy them in some kind of order)-menu options (Can change music and effects volume)-Graphics (although not the best graphics there is an option for ammount of blood when killing zombies)-Personalization (you can level up and CHOOSE what stats you want to put a point into per level)Cons-instructions (there is no way to tell how much any weapon does in damage nor how much hp a zombie has, also no way to tell how much durability a palasade has nore how much damage a zombie can do)-user interface (With absolutely no tutorial or instruction its not the easiest to drop items pick them up or mount weapons on a turret; you can mount weapons on a turret (it uses ammo). The only ui that this game has is a health bar, reload bar and what weapon you are currently using and how much ammo is left for said weapon.-Content (the game has gone a long ways since it came out and has gotten quite a bit more content, but the game lacks on the ui and needs more choices when leveling up)The game is not the best defense game nor the worst, I do believe the dev's are still adding content and they seem to be a caring bunch who would ban people for things they should not say, or just trolling matches for the hell of it. All in all I give this a 2.75/5 There is no storyline whatsoever, there are no spoken dialect and too few types of zombies to give this a higher rating, however for the content and price as a casual game I would recommend this for no more than $1.99.

content:
Posted: August 6, 2015
												My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, "If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately." Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me- "Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through." I agreed. At 28, I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because this game gave me cancer anyway.

content:
Posted: April 10, 2014
												Great little game! Works really well with Xbox 360 controller. Developer seems active on the forums, open to all sugestions! Really looking forward to some of the proposed features of the game!The game really requires some skill, I think the furthest I've got is night 12, passing a night feels really rewarding! After that it gets crazy but from what I've read the developer is working on that.Multiplayer feature is fun but games are hard to connect to and sometimes just lag out. I'm guessing this is being worked on too.No real settings options. Not a big deal for most PC gamers however if your running intel 3000 or less graphics you may get some serious graphical lag even in low resolutions, would like to see visual quality adjustments. Would like to see support for more resolutions, Has trouble over 1080.Gameplay is straight forward and fun! I could nit pick some small things like weapons, characters and other stuff but for the price and the fact it's easy to pick up and have fun, everything else is just icing on the cake!

content:
Posted: April 2, 2014
												Yet Another Zombie Defence is what you would expect a zombie defence game where you have to survive wave afther wave.there is a day/night cycle or a fight/build cycle depending on how you look at it.During the night you fight of zombies and gain money/points during the day you can spent your money on wapeons/defence.a day/night cycle is 1 wave in game the further you get the more difficult the game gets and i mean really difficult it gets hard quick i recomend playing it with a friend but even than its hard.there is only 1 map as of yet and 3 playeble characteres. the controls are simple and if you just want to play a quick matchs you can (you can blast trough the waves really fast with some of the better wapeons)that is my review on Yet Another Zombie Defence ill give it a  7/10 if the update the game with more maps and some more ways on defending your self it would become a 10/10 also the price is nothing so no reason not to give this game a try.

												It was cheap, fairly good reviews and a fast download. I got it to play while another game downloaded, just to waste some time. It has simple gameplay, but it is fun and addictive. I found myself playing long over the time needed for my other game. A game with this much fun at this price easily gets a 10/10 in my book. Is it the funnest game out there? No. But for its price,  and its muti-player capability make it easily better than many games who are 20$+ and is becoming one of my favorite games. I hope in the future there are updates/DLCs adding more upgrades, weapons, and blockades/turrets. They can honestly keep this game going for a very long time easily.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: August 30, 2015
												This game is barely playable. You either run around like a♥♥♥♥♥♥or die. Despite this, the game tells you to hold  your ground and even gives defensive items. None of thesee help for more than a few seconds and after that its back to being downsydrome usain bolt with an AR-15. I do not reccomend this game no matter the price as you will swiftly become bored of this game past the 20 minute mark if not sooner.There are two gamemodes  I only bothered with 1, and are under the assumption the 2nd one is simmiliar. The gamemode I played was a wave survival and for some reason, only the host can purchase weapons for the players in the server. Meaning you do not get to choose how you play this game. If you join a match where the host has only purchased grenades and a chainsaw, you will see yourself reinacting Evil dead meets ISIS with about 3 seconds to prepare.The final nail in the coffin is just how bad the game plays, the controls are clunky and unresponsive, there is no accuracy with the weapons and the graphics make games like Alien Shooter 2 look advanced for their timel.In conclusion this game is not worth the price even at 54cents.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: February 12, 2015
												Simple zombie defence gameTo forfill the zombie craze-movement comes 'yet another zombie defence' game (see what I did there?).  Developed by indie studio 'Awesome games studio', the top down 3D game tasks you with surviving against waves of zombies.Gamplay is is similar to other zombie survival games with a few base building elements thrown in. You start of with a simple pistol, but you can get more weapons later on including sniper, smg, rifles etc. All weapons have limited ammo, which needs to be restocked. There are 2 types of zombies you face: standard and fast ones. The standard zombies move slowly and have a decent amount of health, while the fast ones move very quickly towards you. Before you begin a match, you can choose between 3 characters: a guy, a girl and SWAT guy (I wish there was more character variety).There are two game modes available: 'Defence' and 'Survival'. In defence, you are tasked with surviving waves of zombies. You start near a lamp post (which serves as the only light source) with a simple pistol in hand. The first wave has weak standard zombies. After each  wave you can buy guns, ammo, barricades and turrets to help bolster your defence.  Money is earned by pick ups from corpses. Health pick ups also appear from corpeses as well. With each new wave the zombie's health and damge increase which makes the game get harder as you progress.In survival mode there are no waves of zombies, instead zombies will keep spawning and chasing you. there is also no money in this mode and no option to buy any guns or barricades. Instead guns will occasionally appear as a pick up item on the map. This is the weakest and most unpopular of the two game modes.There is absolutely no story in this game, which isn't necessarily a bad thing as it's just a simple survival game meant to pass the time. However, the addition of a plot could have made the game more engaging for the player.Audio is a mixed bag. On one hand, the music that plays during each wave is great and makes the action more fun (think rock music). However, the guns sounds are really bland and off putting. There is no voice acting in this game.As for level design, well... there is only one map. The map with the light post is played in all game modes and there is no other choices unfortunately. There is also multiplayer available. You can play both the game modes with up to 3 other players. You all share the same money pool, but only one player can buy weapons, barricades etc. The other players need to state which weapons/ammo they want so the other player can buy it for them (I kinda felt this was a tedious element to the multiplayer mode). The game isn't dead yet and you could probrably find a game (however I recommend playing with steam friends as it is not only more enjoyable but you can also communicate better).Do I recommend this game? Well the creator promised  new free content (hopefully new maps or game modes) if there is enough support for the game, which is better than going the DLC route. For only $2 (even less during sale) though, you could probrably do worse.

Pros-Easy to play-Simple controls-Very light game, so;  -Fast to download  -Doesn't take up much space  -Unlikely to lag-Multiplayer includedCons-Collectable money disappears, removing ways to buy weapons/buildings-Costs too much for what it has to offer (Normal Price)-Only 2 modes-3 characters to choose from, all of which aren't any different  -3 characters are also sorta boring, design-wise-Aiming system is unpresice, although simple-Only 1, boring stageOverall, I'm halfway on my opinion. I like the game to a point, which is a tiny bit over how much I dislike it. That's why I recommend this game.

number of helpful: No ratings yet1 person found this review funny
content:
Posted: December 21, 2014
												So, when this was given to me as a gag gift, and I played it, I found it to be... Not what I expected at all. It was a tiny square map with no scenery but a lamp, infinite waves of zombies that get stronger and grow in numbers as the levels go on, about 10 generic weapons and some completely over the top ones, and a soundtrack that you have to experience to understand why I can't talk about it.But to the point, if you get some friends online with you, this game is insanely unbelievably fun. Mainly because if you play alone you notice how frustrating the lack of anything on the map is, and how the fences get useless in the late game, and how that last death was total bullsh*t, and I guess that isn't a point in the game's favour but the absolute joy that comes with playing this co op excuses it.In summary, if you can convince your friends to buy it, you'll love it forever

content:
Posted: December 20, 2015
												I picked this game up for cheap for me and a friend. From the few games I played it was decently fun! Simple and easy to pick up, although I still don't understand a lot of the mechanics. If you're looking for a cheap and quick game that's fun with a friend and want to kill time, this isn't a bad solution. However I would wait for a sale- even at this low price it's questionable whether the money is worth the little content it provides. Not a lack of weapons and such but more of a lack of variety of things to do- unfortunately the entire gameplay formula of "Shoot & Build" can be written on a piece of gum wrapper and it would still fit. While I wouldn't say it's a horrible game at all, I wouldn't be recommending it to people, either.

												 -Your goal is to construct barriers and turrets in order to survive as many nights as    possible against increasingly more difficult waves of zombies. -At the end of each night you are given as much time as you want to construct   your base and purchase weapons, which allows for careful planning.   - I like the turret mechanic, which requires that you purchase a turret mount,    then place whatever weapon you want on top. Turrets can also be destroyed so   you must take that into consideration when placing it. - An overall very fun strategy game for a very small cost.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: January 1, 2015
												This is not a bad game however its not wonderful.So, looking to buy YAZD yea well its probably not the best idea, at full price. You see, on console this games price tag is half of the steam price however to make up for that steam is pretty much always having a sale (Every holiday and more) so it does make up for that. The game doesn't feel complete, the weapons are generic and boring and the defenses are bland and the zombies are vague, un-interesting. L4D 1 & 2 has  a lot more content and on sale for only twice the price of this game - $4.99 on sale. The defense system is also bland and just overall BAD. They help in a way but they dont make this game a stategy game, AT ALL. Its just a little game with about 5-10 hours of fun with 1-3 other people, yea dont try soloing the game its boring and its all a grind. Overall its not actually a awful game it has some good qualities one being the EXTREMLY cheap ammo which is nice, and two modes which are basic but fun. The map is also terrible ONE MAP FOR BOTH MODES WITH NOTHING BUT A LIGHT POST. THATS IT. No buildings no roads just a ♥♥♥♥ing street lamp, with no damn street. Okay, maybe im being a little harsh for an indie game, WELL WHAT THE HELL PROJECT ZOMBOID WAS AN INDIE GAME AND IT HAD WAY MORE CONTENT THAN THIS. This game tries to be a new and fresh take on the zombie genre well guess what it is, i have never seen a more repetitive zombie game. EVER. That being said if you get it on sale and play with a couple of friends its not bad, keep in mind if you expect to have 100 hrs in this game you way in over your head by like a damn mile.FINAL SCORE - SP = 4/10 - MP = 7/10ONLY GET IT IF YOU CAN MORE THAN 1 DONT PLAY BY YOUR SELF - YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: January 2, 2015
												I picked this game up for next to nothing during the 2014 Holiday Sale. Figured even if it's complete garbage, my games collection at least looks a little bigger. Then I actually played it, not expecting much from it, and man was I surprised; it was actually a lot of fun!Obviously it's low-budget and very simple. There's no engaging story, or character development, and there really doesn't need to be. You're dropped into the middle of an empty lot with just a street lamp as your friend, and you blast Z's in the face. Fun on a bun!You earn cash from the aforementioned face-blasting, which you can use to buy barricades, weapons, and ammo between nights (the shotgun is your best friend starting out), and see how long you can last. There's an online co-op mode as well, which I've yet to try, but I just wanted to get on here and compliment the creator of this game for a great budget-title well done.

content:
Posted: January 14, 2016
												Well they price have gone up since i was playing but still worth every penny.Fun survival game to play with yourself and with your friends and just as the title says it's just another zombie defense except this zombie defense defeats all the titles.Pros:+Weapons (Fun weapons and good options to pick from, what i was meant to say is that the weapons work differently and there isn't full of automatic guns for example)+Map (The map might look gray and boring but it's a good map to run around on and build because you are going to need alot of space)+Coop (Ofcourse we all expected it to be coop but this coop is up to 4 players and works fantasticly with the coop buy system)+Shop (I like the way they had added sales on different weapons because it tends to make you build for different things and doesn't make it as repedetive as it can be at times)+Cheap (Do i really have to explain this one?)+Characters (You don't have only 1 character but they have made it so you can choose from different models and make it so that you actually can tell eachoter appart, there is only 3 models in the game so far that i know about but last time i played was about a year ago so they might have added way more other stuff that i don't know about)+gamemodes (Instead of making it sandbox-ish you can also play as a survivor that goes around and finds different guns to slay hordes of zombies that comes after you, i have slowly been falling inlove with this gamemode but mostely becuase i grew tired of sitting behind a wall for the entire game)+levels (Yes you can level up your character in this game, i mean who would've thought it from a game that only costs 2 euros right?)Cons:It's too cheap to have any real complains about it, i mean come on it costs 2 euros for god sakeJust so y'all know this is a really old review from when i had last played it so this might be a bit outdated.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 28, 2015
												Yet Another Zombie Defense (YAZD) is worth every penny of it's low price. In YAZD you move through stages called "nights," in which you fight hordes of zombies. As you progress the zombie hordes become larger and stronger in several ways, but at the same time you are expanding a base, gaining new weapons, and improving your character's stats. The controls are simple and the game is straight forward, yet there are several strategies that make this game fun and re-playable. Additionally, it is very easy to join friends or online matches, and the game includes several fun achievements. I definitely recommend this game to others.

												YAZD is really simple Zombie Defence game (ORLY?) which I once bought because it was in really big discount (even though full price for this game isn't that high either).Even though game is really simple (two game modes: Defence and Survival) developers seem to care for this game and have made updates: added new weapons, power ups, HUD changes and levels.Would I recommend this game? 												This is pretty casual zombie defense game.All you have to do is killing zombies, collecting money, upgrading defensive structures and guns, killing more zombies, upgrading more and more and in the end.. killing even more zombies!It's definitely fun and totally worth the price (quite often in sale for 49 or 99 cents).Don't be afraid about the graphics, it doesn't really look as bad as it looks on those preview pictures and it's fun even with these old-school graphics, you just have to give it a shot!TL;DR: Great game for zombie defense fans, definitely worth its price if you manage to get it in sale! :)

content:
Posted: June 12, 2015
												Don't ever buy defenses. Buy weapons. Weapons and Ammo. And lots of them. If there are four of you, buy tesla coils, freeze guns, and lasers. And just RUN.Oh, the game. Yes, the game itself is very fun. It's an excellent time-waster and it's addictive. If you're looking for some decent arcadey fun, this is it.Graphics, gameplay, everything wise, this game is literally an arcade shoot-em' up run and gun game. There is little redeeming quality about this game except the amount of fun you will have, which is probably why you're looking at the game in the first place.

number of helpful: No ratings yet
content:
Posted: April 26, 2015
												Yet Another Zombie Defense is a simple amazing game for just 2.00 $.Its gameplay is good and addictive but gets repetitive after a while.Has 2 good gamemodes, Endless nights (A survival of champions) and defence (a strategic gamemode)I definetly recommend this game if you have a couple of friends to play with (about 2-4 is great).Now for the improvents this game could see:#1 More maps, I could see a few new map ideas like a subway or a grocery store.#2 More weapons, Like a Revolver or Semi Rifle.#3 Multi-leveled maps, Like an upstair or basement in a future map.#4 More ammo types, Like Exploding rounds or Incindeary rounds.#5 Perks, Like Looter (It would give you more money upon foe death) and around that general area.#6 Zombie bosses, like a giant tank like zombie or a zombie using a chainsaw.Now that I have gotten this all out of the way I can give my rating.My rating is 8/10.Now I love this game but I definitly see room for improvement and changes but overall its a great game.

												I would not say this game is amazing or a must-buy,but with friends this was pretty enjoyable for 3 hours. After that it is repetitive and you might play it once more, months later.It's like worth 50 cent for me, and that is for how much you can buy it as a gift inthe market. ONe thing: They should make the controls easier and more clears, buying♥♥♥♥♥♥is a nightmare...
